snippet: Aaron Ziegelman, a New Yorker who gave millions to Reconstructionist Jewish causes, is seeking donations to settle with creditors who accuse him of a Ponzi scheme.
abstract: New York real estate mogul and philanthropist Aaron Ziegelman is seeking donations to settle with creditors who accuse him of having engaged in a Ponzi scheme in which investors lost millions of dollars; Ziegelman says he has received outpourings of financial and personal support from some of the biggest names in New York real estate, philanthropy and other circles.
lead_paragraph: Aaron Ziegelman, a New Yorker who gave millions to Reconstructionist Jewish causes, is seeking donations to settle with creditors who accuse him of a Ponzi scheme.

headline.seo: Aaron Ziegelman, Former Real Estate Mogul, Seeks Charity
headline.main: Faced With Lawsuits, a Former Mogul and Philanthropist Solicits Charity
headline.print_headline: Faced With Lawsuits, a Former Mogul and Philanthropist Solicits Charity
